verses.text: Ayic 18 ab'ilxo yoch winhaj Jeroboam yuninal winhaj Nabat reyal t'a Israel, ix och winhaj Abiam reyal t'a Judá.
Oxe' ab'il ix yak' reyal chi' winh t'a Jerusalén. Maaca sb'i ix snun winh, yisil ix winhaj Abisalom.

Ha winhaj Abiam chi', ix sb'eyb'alej chukal winh icha ix sk'ulej winh smam winh. Te chuk tas ix sk'ulej winh t'a yichanh Jehová sDiosal. Maj sk'anab'ajej Jehová winh t'a smasanil sk'ool icha sk'ulejnac winhaj rey David, aton winh smam icham winh.
Palta yujto xajan winhaj rey David chi' yuj Jehová, yuj chi' maj satcanel yinhtilal winh. Ixto ochcan yinhtilal winh chi' reyal t'a Jerusalén. Anhejtona' ix scolcanel jun chonhab' chi' Jehová,

yujto te wach' yutejnac sb'a winhaj rey David chi' t'a yichanh. Manh yik'nacoquel spensar winh t'a tas yalnac Jehová chi', anhej val smul winh ochnac aton yuj tas ajnac smilan winhaj Urías hitita winh.

Ha winhaj Abiam chi', ix yak'nhej oval winh yet' winhaj Jeroboam chi', icha sk'ulejnac winhaj Roboam smam winh. Ha yab'ixal winhaj Abiam chi' yet' masanil tas sk'ulejnac winh, tz'ib'ab'ilcan b'aj aycan yab'ixal eb' winh sreyal Judá.
Axo yic ix cham winh, ix mucji winh t'a schonhab' winhaj David, haxo jun winh yuninal winh scuchan Asa ix ochcan reyal sq'uexuloc.
Ha winhaj Asa, ix schael yich winh yak'an reyal t'a Judá, a val yic 20 ab'il yoch winhaj Jeroboam chi' reyal t'a Israel.
Ha winhaj Asa chi', 41 ab'il ix yak' reyal winh t'a Jerusalén. Maaca sb'i ix snun chichim winh, yisil ix winhaj Abisalom.
Te wach' tas ix sk'ulej winhaj rey Asa chi' t'a yichanh Jehová, icha val ix sk'ulej winhaj rey David smam icham winh.

Ix spechel masanil eb' winh vinac winh t'a yol smacb'en chi', aton eb' winh sk'ulan ajmulal yet' yetvinaquil t'a juntzanh lugar b'aj tz'och ejmelal. Masanil juntzanh yechel comon dios ix sb'o eb' smam yicham winh, ix laj satpaxel winh.

Ix yiq'uel snivanil yelk'och ix snun chichim winh, aton ix Maaca. Ix schecpax winh mak'jocpoj jun yechel Asera yajb'entac yak'nac b'o ix snun chichim chi', ix schecan nhusjoctz'a winh t'a sti' ha' Cedrón.
Wach'chom maj yiq'uel winh masanil juntzanh lugar yic ejmelal t'a juntzanh lugar chaanh, palta te wach' ix yutej spensar winh t'a yichanh Jehová t'a masanil tiempo.
Ix yak'anpaxcanoch q'uen oro winh yet' q'uen plata b'aj sik'chajcan tas tz'ak'ji yicoc Jehová yet' juntzanhxo yamk'ab' ix yak'kan winh smam winh yet' pax juntzanh ix sb'o winh.
Aynhej oval t'a skal winhaj Asa sreyal Judá yet' winhaj Baasa sreyal Israel.
Ix cot winhaj Baasa yak' oval t'a Judá, ix och ijan winh sb'oan scuartel t'a chonhab' Ramá, yic smacan b'e winh yic wach' manhxa mach syal sk'och t'a Judá chi'.

Yuj chi', haxo winhaj Asa chi' ix ik'anelta masanil q'uen oro yet' q'uen plata sik'b'iltocan t'a yol stemplo Jehová yet' t'a spalacio winh. Ix schecanb'at eb' ayoch t'a yopisio yet' winh yic sb'at yak'ancan q'uen chi' eb' t'a winhaj Ben-adad sreyal Siria cajan t'a Damasco, aton winh yuninal winhaj Tabrimón, yixchiquin winhaj Hezión. Ha yet' q'uen tumin chi', ix yalanb'at winh t'a winhaj Ben-adad chi' icha tik:

Co b'o junok co trato, icha sk'ulejnac eb' co mam quicham. Tik svak'b'at q'uen oro yet' q'uen plata in silab'oc t'ayach. Ak' lajvoc a trato yet' winhaj Baasa sreyal Israel yic ol yactej winh yak'an oval ved'oc, xchib'at winhaj Asa chi'.

Ix scha sk'ol winhaj Ben-adad chi' tas ix yalb'at winhaj rey Asa chi', yuj chi' ix scheccot eb' soldado winh yak' oval t'a yol yic Israel. Aton juntzanh chonhab' tik ix yak' ganar eb' soldado winh chi': Ijón, Dan, Abel-bet-maaca yet' masanil Cineret yet' masanil smacb'en Neftalí.
Ayic ix yab'an winhaj Baasa icha chi', ix yactan winh sb'oanq'ue chonhab' Ramá, ix meltzaj winh t'a chonhab' Tirsa.

Yuj chi' ix smolb'ej masanil eb' winh aj Judá winhaj rey Asa chi', manhxa junok mach maj k'ochoc. Ix yik'ancot jantac q'uen q'ueen eb' yet' te te', aton juntzanh chi' van yak'anoch winhaj Baasa yic sb'oanq'ue chonhab' Ramá chi'. Axo yet' juntzanh chi' ix sb'oq'ue scuartel winhaj rey Asa chi' t'a chonhab' Geba t'a yol yic Benjamín yet' t'a chonhab' Mizpa.

Ha jantacto yab'ixal winhaj Asa, juntzanh oval ix yak' ganar winh, masanil tas ix sk'ulej winh yet' juntzanh chonhab' ix sb'oq'ue winh, tz'ib'ab'ilcan b'aj aycan yab'ixal eb' winh sreyal Judá. Axo yic ichamxo winh, ix och jun yab'il t'a yoc winh.
Ayic ix cham winh, ix mucji winh t'a schonhab' winhaj rey David b'aj mucan eb' smam yicham. Axo winh yuninal winh scuchan Josafat ix ochcan reyal sq'uexuloc.
Ayic schab'ilxo ab'il yoch winhaj Asa reyal t'a Judá, ix schaanel yich winhaj Nadab yuninal winhaj Jeroboam yak'an reyal t'a Israel, chab' ab'il ix yak' reyal winh.
Te chuk tas ix sk'ulej winh t'a yichanh Jehová. Ha sb'eyb'al winh smam winh ix sb'eyb'alej, aton winh cuchb'annacb'at eb' israel t'a chukal.

Palta haxo winhaj Baasa yuninal winhaj Ahías yinhtilal Isacar ix och ajk'olal t'a winhaj Nadab chi'. Ayic ix yak'an oval winhaj Nadab yet' eb' soldado Israel t'a chonhab' Gibetón, t'a yol yic eb' filisteo, ata' ix miljicham winh yuj winhaj Baasa chi'. Yuj chi' ayic yoxilxo ab'il yoch winhaj Asa reyal t'a Judá, ix schaanel yich winhaj Baasa chi' yak'an reyal t'a chonhab' Israel.

Anhej val yic ix och winh reyal chi', ix smilancham masanil yinhtilal winhaj Jeroboam chi' winh, pilan ix cham eb' yuj winh, manhxa junok eb' ix cani, icha yalnaccan winhaj Ahías schecab' Jehová aj Silo.
Ix uji jun tik yuj smul winhaj Jeroboam ix yak'ochi ayic ix scuchb'anb'at eb' yetisraelal winh t'a chukal. Yuj chi' ix stzuntzajcot yoval sk'ol Jehová sDiosal chonhab' Israel yuj winh.
Ha jantacto yab'ixal winhaj Nadab yet' masanil tas ix sk'ulej, tz'ib'ab'ilcan b'aj aycan yab'ixal eb' winh sreyal Israel.
Ix ochnhej oval t'a skal winhaj Asa sreyal Judá yet' winhaj Baasa sreyal Israel.
Ayic yoxilxo ab'il yoch winhaj Asa reyal t'a Judá, ix schaanel yich winhaj Baasa yuninal winhaj Ahías yak'an reyal t'a Israel, t'a chonhab' Tirsa. 24 ab'il ix yak' reyal winh.
Masanil tas ix sk'ulej winh, te chuk t'a yichanh Jehová, icha sk'ulejnac winhaj Jeroboam, aton winh cuchb'annacb'at eb' israel t'a chukal.
